patthana14.31:4.1: Sappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.31:5.1: Appītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.31:6.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana14.31:7.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.31:8.1: Napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.31:9.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana14.31:10.1: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.31:11.1: Nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.31:12.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana14.31:13.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.31:14.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.31:15.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
